subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Adriana's Files/healing.mp3 
  Uploaded by : adrianamjones <adrianamjones@...> 
  Description : 'slow the tempo' to hear these: cured? cured. I'm as before. Mom's concussion is healing... an animal wounded... give them to me... whats wrong? pain (words superimposed), which hurts? all of them...really?... all of them... changed... beautiful... its normal.. 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Adriana%27s%20Files/healing.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:
http://help.yahoo.com/l/us/yahoo/groups/original/members/web/index.html
Regards,

adrianamjones <adrianamjones@...>
